User report:

Sample of APS-Filter printcap file (ESP GhostScript must be installed, as it provides the "gdi"/"samsunggdi" driver):

 
# APS1_BEGIN:printer1 
# - don't delete start label for apsfilter printer1 
# - no other printer defines between BEGIN and END LABEL 
lp|samsunggdi;r=600x600;q=medium;c=gray;p=a4;m=auto:\ 
    :lp=/dev/usb/lp0:\ 
    :if=/etc/apsfilter/basedir/bin/apsfilter:\ 
    :sd=/var/spool/lpd/lp:\ 
    :lf=/var/spool/lpd/lp/log:\ 
    :af=/var/spool/lpd/lp/acct:\ 
    :mx#0:\ 
    :sh: 
# APS1_END - don't delete this
Sample of SETUP.cfg file from apsfilter:


PRINTER='samsunggdi' 
RESOLUTION='600x600' 
COLOR='gray' 
PAPER='a4' 
METHOD='auto' 
QUALITY='medium'
